name: remeasure
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
to measure something again in order to check its size, length, etc.: We went back and remeasured the rooms to be sure our furniture would fit into them. I re-measured the distance to confirm the accuracy of the original data. Related word
remeasurement
More examplesFewer examplesThey went back to the park and remeasured the area where the chemical had been sprayed.They spent several days carefully measuring and remeasuring the size of the cages.The race judges could not believe his time was correct so they remeasured the length of the course.
